focusOutside.description: Function called when the focus is moved outside the component

formatChange.description: Function called when the color format changes

interactOutside.description: Function called when an interaction happens outside the component

openChange.description: Handler that is called when the user opens or closes the color picker.

update:modelValue.description: The callback fired when the model value changes.

valueChange.description: Handler that is called when the value changes, as the user drags.

valueChangeEnd.description: Handler that is called when the user stops dragging.

defaultOpen.description: The initial open state of the color picker.

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the color picker when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control the state of the color picker.

disabled.description: Whether the color picker is disabled

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.
